ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] HS Key
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t kill any frogs, I just used 51 Selo s to get to him, handed him the 2 items, let Selo s repulse to go back to invis, and handed in the items as
ygData.messageBody:
I didn't kill any frogs, I just used 51 Selo's to get to him, handed him the
2 items, let Selo's repulse to go back to invis, and handed in the items as
indifferent faction. Sneak also works to get you to indifferent, and I
believe the quest was fixed to work at dubious.

And then I never used the key heh. I shoulda gone to charasis at least once
before I quit.

Shada Iceheart [Retired]
<Afterlife>

> Clear
> the cave of the gaz knights and/or krup or whatever guards
> him. I read it
> on allakhazam I believe, that he is their slave, and will not
> speak or aid
> others while they exist. Kill them, he will not aggro. Once
> you have done
> this, even at dubious, he will give you the HS Key as a
> reward. To be sure,
> follow his text, to get him to schpeel about the fang and the
> spear of the
> Chancellor.
